alert.note: Alert for Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 11:18AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN SWITZERLAND, EASTERN CARROLL, WESTERN GRANT, CENTRAL OWEN AND WESTERN GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 AM EDT... At 1118 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Kentucky Speedway, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, frequent cloud-to-ground lightning, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Williamstown, Dry Ridge, Vevay, Owenton, Kentucky Speedway, Glencoe, Ghent, Sanders, Corinth, Sparta, Worthville, Stewartsville, Interstate 71 at Mile Marker 52, Interstate 71 at US Route 127, Langstaff, Wheatley, New Liberty, Elliston, Interstate 71 at State Route 227 and Long Ridge. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 44 and 61. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 157 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT for southeastern Indiana...and northern Kentucky. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
